WEBLOGIN Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

WEBLOGIN is the web authentication login page, to which any web application can redirect in order to have a user log in and create a session id

once the user has successfully logged in, he or she will be redirected back to the calling application

Author:
Kenneth Sharp
Version:
3.0 (released September 15, 2005)
